page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ME
page.content: TUESDAY 7:35 Mum wakes me.I lie in bed a while I go downstairs in pyjamas, have my breakfast.(Crunchy nut cornflakes), go upstairs and make my bed. 7:50 My alarm goes off. I get dressed. 8:00. I open my curtains,feed the fish and check I have my things for school. 8:15. I lie on my bed and read a comic. 8:30 My sister says she's going I run downstairs, shout goodbye and walk to school. I stand around talking with my friends.We then go to register I.S. is first with{Mrs Griffiths,}all morning. After lunch we have Maths with {Mr Cole.}By the end of the lesson my hand is always aching. Next it is Chemistry with{Mr Martin.}We register at the end of the day. At 3:50 (late) we are let out. I walk home, have a sandwich do my homework, watch T.V. and then go to bed.
